webscript.description: Retrieves statistics using solr. For a list of potential facets call it with /api/solr/stats?listFacets=true You can pass one of these facets in eg. facet=content.creator . The facet name can be used as a I18n resource bundle key, it also has a predefined structure: group.property[.type] eg. content.created.datetime. The [.type] is optional, the default is String.
